attributes.action: End nation wide football and instate current leaders as champions due to covid19
attributes.additional_details: Save lives and stop the spread of covid19
attributes.background: Extend the lockdown to nation wide football as footballers are unable to abide by lockdown rules.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the footballing authorities.  

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566813
